Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA)

Why study ACCA with MCKL?

ACCA-trained professionals are one of the most sought-after finance professionals by employers across the globe. They are known to be equipped with strategic thinking, technical skills and professional values, and have the ability to deliver across every aspect and area of the profession.

International Recognition:
The Platinum Status

Personalised classes with two-way interaction between lecturer and students, allowing students to learn and collaborate in an active learning environment.

Great Students Experience

MCKL is one of the Top 3 Institutions in Kuala Lumpur with the Platinum Status Approved Learning Partner (ALP) of ACCA, the most prestigious level of the ALP programme.

Learning Opportunity with Experts

Opportunity to expose and obtain relevant finance and accounting industry experience from multinational company experts.

High Pass Rates

MCKL delivers high-quality teaching to students with proven record of sustaining global pass rates.

Professional Accounting Programmes with MCKL

ACCA Foundation in Accountancy (FIA)

KL: KPT/JPS(R2/344/3/0183)(A9696)01/24

Intake: 10 Jul

ACCA FIA is the entry level qualification consisting of 7 modules. It is the fast-tracked route that allows students to complete the ACCA Qualification in just 3 years.

100% Merit Scholarship Available: Apply with Trial/Forecast result and get your confirmation on the spot*

*T&C Applies

ACCA Qualification

KL: KPT/JPS(R2/344/6/0064)(FA1206)06/29

Intake: 10 Jul

ACCA programme is designed to equip students with in-depth knowledge, techniques, and skills in all accounting areas, including financial accounting, assurance, taxation and financial management.

About MCKL

Welcome to Methodist College Kuala Lumpur
An Institution where values and tradition meet excellence in education!

For over four decades, Methodist College Kuala Lumpur (MCKL) has been providing quality, holistic education in the best of Methodist tradition. MCKL fully embraces the challenges and opportunities of educating and preparing students for further education, professional development, and job careers in the new IR 4.0 environment.

Over 40 years of Proven Track Record

Globally Recognised

Providing renowned professional pre-university and tertiary programmes.

Industry Revolution 4.0

Operations & learning system in line with the IR 4.0 environment.

Microsoft Recognition

Providing flexibility with 100% blended learning via Microsoft cloud learning system.

MCKL DNA

Nurturing students with Character Formation and Service Learning programmes throughout their studies.
